pr_title: [fr] added rule ACCORD_DE_ADJ, adjusted D_N_QUE_AVOIR_PPA & CONFUSION…

timeline.message: [fr] added rule ACCORD_DE_ADJ, adjusted D_N_QUE_AVOIR_PPA & CONFUSION_PPA_IND_2E_GROUPE

timeline.author: udomai
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -9052,27 +9052,110 @@ though, and has since been slightly modified)-->
               <token>de</token>
               <token postag="V.*inf" postag_regexp="yes"/>
           </pattern>
-          <message>Did you mean <suggestion><match no="3" postag_replace="V$1 ind pres 3 $2" postag="V(.*) ppa m ([sp])" postag_regexp="yes"/></suggestion>?</message>
+          <message>Ici, le participe passé est de rigeur. Vouliez-vous dire <suggestion><match no="3" postag_replace="V$1 ind pres 3 $2" postag="V(.*) ppa m ([sp])" postag_regexp="yes"/></suggestion> ?</message>
